ygData.subject: Re: Flashback
ygData.msgSnippet: the fishing pole is not broken, I had one until a few weeks ago when I turned it into a spyglass. I can show you the spyglass if you don t believe me and my
ygData.messageBody:
the fishing pole is not broken, I had one until a few weeks ago when I
turned it into a spyglass. I can show you the spyglass if you don't believe
me and my friend is going to get me another fishing pole that I'll show you
too if you'd like. we just have to find the last book and we can all make
all the fishing poles we want.

Fixer, gnomish enchanter, Cazic-Thule


> From: leigh@...
>
> I petitioned last night about tinkering, I asked the GM if tinkering was
> broken and he said no, then I asked why no one can make a colapseable
> fishing pole, and he said that part was broken. So until they get a
patch,
> forget about the fishing pole.
>
>
> Malbus
> 30 Wizard (wow, 30 sucks)
> Tarew Marr
